name: Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer
description:
This darling Christmas hat is crochet with soft wool blend yarn. It features a big button nose and hand stitched antlers. The ears have holiday plaid fabric hand stitching inside for extra Christmas cuteness!
This hat also comes with a satin bow on a clip for all the little girls out there!

***Please see the “Welcome” section on my shop page for current turnaround times. Thank you!

Please note colors might vary slightly due to dye lot and computer monitor output.
CARE -Hand wash in cold water & lay flat to dry
WARNING - My products may contain small sewn on parts (buttons, felt embellishments ect.) so I do recommend that baby be watched while wearing. 

DARLING photo by Lisa Slate Photography!

These “Luv Bugs” are made with soft and fuzzy yarn.  They feature heart antennae, glitter noses and bitty buggy eyes.  Each hat comes with a yellow polka dot bow clip.  
 
***Please see the “Welcome” section on my shop page for current turnaround times. Thank you!

Please note colors might vary slightly due to dye lot and computer monitor output. 
CARE -Hand wash in cold water & lay flat to dry 
WARNING - My products may contain small sewn on parts (buttons, felt embellishments ect.) so I do recommend that baby be watched while wearing.

Sweet photos by Lisa Slate photography!

name: Bee Mine
description:
Bee Mine is made with wool blend yarns.   It features heart antennae that have been hand stitched. The antennae can be posed slightly to your liking.  This bee also has the sweetest little eyes and fluffy nose.  Bee Mine comes with a gingham bow clip.  You can add or remove it at any time.

***Please see my “Welcome” section on my shop page for current turnaround times. Thank you!

name: Prince Pucker Up
description:
Prince Pucker Up, stealer of kisses!

This frog is crochet in a wool blend yarn.  He features a felt crown placed on the top of his head.  The crown is detailed with small pearls for extra sweetness.  Prince Puck Up also comes with a simple pink felt heart.  The heart has a small piece of velcro on the back which allows you to move the heart around a place where you like.  You can add it to the crown or even place on the hat to resemble “lips”.  FUN!

**Please see my “Welcome” section on my shop page for current turnaround times. Thank you!

description:

This sweet Bo Peep bonnet is crochet in a variety of wool yarns.  The front is detailed with a pink scallop design.  Behind the scallops I sew on a row of eyelet lace.   Each corner has “braids” complete with tiny matching bow ties!  The bangs can be pushed back completely or styled to your liking.  Don’t forget to checkout her matching sheep bonnet!
